pages.text: Muensterella is genus of cephalopod from the Jurassic. It belongs to group included within octopod, so it is related to the octopus. According to rare soft tissue preservation, despite its classification, it had the appearance of a cuttlefish. Its ecology is thought to be an ambush predator like cuttlefish.
